sentences.sContent: In this example, we will use the most straightforward method of all -- writing our object reference to a file that will be picked up by our client.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this example, we will use the most straightforward method of all -- writing our object reference to a file that will be picked up by our client.
sentences.sCn: 在这个示例中，我们将使用所有方法中最直截了当的一种 — 将对象引用写入一个文件，该 文件将由客户机选取。

sentences.sContent: ...A college application is a relatively straightforward questionnaire asking for the basics: name...

synos.tran: 简单的；坦率的；明确的；径直的

remMethod.val: straight(直的) ＋ forward(向前的) → 正直的
